name: Format\Text
description: Properties shared by all text component types.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of Link objects that provide additional information for ranges of text in the text property.

properties.name: format
properties.description: The formatting or markup method applied to the text.

properties.name: inlineTextStyles
properties.description: An array of InlineTextStyle objects you can use to apply different text styles to ranges of text. For each InlineTextStyle, you should supply a rangeStart, rangeLength, and either a text style or the identifier of a text style that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: role
properties.description: The role of a text component depends on the type of content it contains. For example, a PullQuote should have a role of pullquote, and for text in the article body, the role should be body. See Component.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to display in the article, including any formatting tags depending on the format property.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: Either an inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a ComponentTextStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document in the componentTextStyles property in Article Document.Component Text Styles.
